bug.author: enoonIT
bug.description: I tried to perform a "Classify One" during training of an Alexnet (on Caffe). The new page (which should show the result) remains empty, even after several minutes. The training is now stuck. I don't usually have this issue, this is the first time it has happened to me. I had to kill the server and restart it.

I was using the source version, dowloaded on the 21st of march. I now updated to the latest version, let's see if it happen again (I hope not!)
I've also noticed this on version '3.0' . Haven't had it happen with the current source of '3.3'.

I believe this was fixed with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/573>#573</denchmark-link> . Feel free to re-open the issue if you see this again after <denchmark-link:https://github.com/NVIDIA/DIGITS/pull/573>#573</denchmark-link> .
